sen.j: 土御門 有春（つちみかど ありはる、文亀元年（1501年） - 永禄12年6月19日 (旧暦)（1569年8月1日））は、室町時代から安土桃山時代の公卿・陰陽家。
sen.e: Ariharu TSUCHIMIKADO (1501-August 1, 1569) was Kugyo (the top court official) and Inyoka (the Yin and Yang school of philosophy) who lived from the Muromachi period to the Azuchi-Momoyama period.

Ariharu TSUCHIMIKADO (1501-August 1, 1569) was Kugyo (top court official) and Inyoka (a practitioner of the Yin and Yang school of philosophy) who lived from the Muromachi Period to the Azuchi-Momoyama Period.

Ariharu TSUCHIMIKADO (1501-August 1, 1569) was Kugyo (top court official) and Inyoka (a practitioner of the Yin and Yang school of philosophy) who lived from the Muromachi period to the Azuchi-Momoyama period.

sen.j: 堂上家（家格は、半家 (公家)・阿倍氏）である、土御門家の29代目当主。
sen.e: He was the twenty-ninth family head of the Tsuchimikado family which was Tosho-ke (the hereditary lineage of Court nobles occupying relatively high ranks) (the social standing was hange (kuge), kuge of lower rank and the ABE clan).

He was the twenty-ninth family head of the Tsuchimikado family which was Tosho-ke, the hereditary lineage of court nobles occupying relatively high ranks, and the social standing was hange (kuge), kuge of lower rank and the ABE clan.

He was the twenty-ninth family head of the Tsuchimikado family which was Tosho-ke, the hereditary lineage of court nobles occupying relatively high ranks, and the social standing was hange (kuge), kuge of lower rank and the ABE clan.

sen.j: 陰陽頭（従二位非参議）・土御門有宣の子。
sen.e: He was the child of Arinobu TSUCHIMIKADO, Onmyo no kami (Director of Onmyoryo, or Bureau of Divination) (Junii (Junior Second Rank), non-Councilor.)
He was the child of Arinobu TSUCHIMIKADO, Onmyo no kami (Director of the Onmyoryo, or Bureau of Divination), and who attained Junii (Junior Second Rank), non-Councilor.
He was the child of Arinobu TSUCHIMIKADO, Onmyo no kami (Director of the Onmyoryo, or Bureau of Divination), and who attained Junii (Junior Second Rank), non-Councilor.

sen.j: 実子に陰陽頭（従三位非参議）土御門有脩、陰陽家・賀茂在高（賀茂在富の養子）など。
sen.e: His biological children included Ariyasu TSUCHIMIKADO, Onmyo no kami (Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), non-Councilor) and KAMO no Aritaka (the adopted child of KAMO no Aritomi), Inyoka.
His biological children included Ariyasu TSUCHIMIKADO, Onmyo no kami (Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), non-Councilor) and KAMO no Aritaka (the adopted child of KAMO no Aritomi), Inyoka.
His biological children included Ariyasu TSUCHIMIKADO, Onmyo no kami (Jusanmi (Junior Third Rank), non-Councilor) and KAMO no Aritaka (the adopted child of KAMO no Aritomi), Inyoka.

sen.j: 官途は、従三位陰陽頭（非参議）。
sen.e: His kanto (government service) was Jusanmi, Onmyo no kami (non-Councilor).
His government service was as Jusanmi, Onmyo no kami (non-Councilor).
His government service was as Jusanmi, Onmyo no kami (non-Councilor).
